"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5421d90c63687223ad000000#post_5421d90c63687223ad000000
Hollywood never had any ideas to run out if in the first place.
People talk all the time about how Hollywood killed film as an art and Hollywood has gotten corrupt. The film industry has always been like that. It is, first and foremost, an industry. Your movie may be godlike but if it can't make any money than it's no good.
